name: Ayesha Khan
message: This app has completely changed how I connect with the Quran. The audio recitation and translation features are so easy to use!

name: Omar Abdullah
message: I love the clean design and tafseer options. It helps me understand verses better. Would love to see dark mode soon!

name: Fatima Noor
message: Perfect app for daily Quran reading! I especially appreciate the bookmarking and daily ayah reminder feature.

name: Ali Raza
message: Beautiful UI and accurate Arabic text. I use it every morning after Fajr prayer. Highly recommended for everyone.

name: Sana Malik
message: Itâ€™s a great companion for learning tajweed. The slow playback and transliteration help a lot for beginners.
